text: (napiye!) Itu (umakku) maraivana carittirankalil ullatakum. Vahyi mulamakave nam itai umakku arivikkirom. Itarku munnar niro allatu umatu makkalo itai arintirukkavillai. Akave, (napiye! Nuhaippol nirum ciramankalaic) cakittup poruttiruppiraka. Niccayamaka mutivana verri iraiyaccam utaiyavarkalukkuttan
